content: As with his other big attack, your Pillar Stance can help keep you away from the blast, but you can also try creating a Ring of Fire to give yourself "holy ground" of sorts to stay safe in from the otherwise chilly prison.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang' and the sub-subsection 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
As with his other big attack, your Pillar Stance can help keep you away from the blast, but you can also try creating a Ring of Fire to give yourself "holy ground" of sorts to stay safe in from the otherwise chilly prison.
